Name: Green Beast (Pub Version)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of thin cucumber slices.
Review: Absinthe loves to combine with lime, sugar and water. This simple drink combines all to great effect.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2010 for Pernod Absinthe by Charles Vexenat in Paris, France.
Nutrition: One serving of Green Beast (Pub Version) contains 126 calories
